Typography

The typography base is Open Sans served by Google, set at 15rem (15px) over a 1.4 line height (21px). Other type basics like anchors, strong, emphasis, and underline are all obviously included.

Headings are based on Montserrat also served by Google creates a family of distinct sizes each with specific letter-spacing, line-height, and margins.

h1.Heading <h1> Semibold 40px

h2.Heading <h2> Semibold 36px

h3.Heading <h3> Semibold 30px

h4.Heading <h4> Semibold 24px

h5.Heading <h5> Semibold 18px
h6.Heading <h6> Semibold 15px

h1. Heading Secondary Text

h2. Heading Secondary Text

h3. Heading Secondary Text

h4. Heading Secondary Text

h5. Heading Secondary Text
h6. Heading Secondary Text

1 Active Row Active Row Active Row
2 Column content Column content Column content

7 Warning Row Warning Row Warning Row
8 Column content Column content Column content
9 Danger Row Danger Row Danger Row
